ratio = [i for i in range(101)]

# Plotting
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
plt.plot(ratio, data_percentage, label='Data')
plt.plot(ratio, model_percentage, label='Model')
plt.title('Rent-to-income CDF')
plt.xlabel('Ratio')
plt.ylabel('Percentage')
plt.legend()
plt.grid(True)
plt.tight_layout()

# Show plot
plt.show()
